title: Texas Eagle Timetable
heading: Amtrak's Texas Eagle
top_text: Trains 21 and 421 are the same train from Chicago to San Antonio; cars separate three days a week to become train 421 to Los Angeles. Three days a week, train 422 joins with train 22 at San Antonio to become the same train from San Antonio to Chicago.
bottom_text:
MST Mountain Standard Time
Arizona does not observe Daylight Savings Time.
Please double-check all Arizona calling times
when spring and fall clock changes
occur in other states.

Local connecting trains are provided:
at Chicago and Joliet by Metra,
at St. Louis by Metrolink,
at Dallas by DART,
at Dallas and Fort Worth by Trinity Railway Express,
at Fort Worth by TEXRail,
at Tucson by Sun Link Streetcar,
at Ontario, Pomona, and Los Angeles by Metrolink,
and at Los Angeles by LA Metro.
